SEARCH
Package UserSystem

Class PatientMedicalRecord

Object
PatientMedicalRecord
public class PatientMedicalRecord extends Object
The PatientMedicalRecord class provides functionality for patients to view their personal medical records, including appointment details, diagnoses, and prescriptions.

  • Constructor Details

    • PatientMedicalRecord

      public PatientMedicalRecord(String UserId)
      Constructs a PatientMedicalRecord object and initializes patient details and their corresponding medical records.
      Parameters:
      UserId - the ID of the patient whose records are being managed.

  • Method Details

    • patientMedicalRecord

      public void patientMedicalRecord()
      Displays the medical records for the current patient. Includes personal details, appointment outcomes, diagnoses, and prescriptions if available. If no records are found, an appropriate message is displayed.
